name: Infinite Shooting: Galaxy War
description:
Infinite Shooting: Galaxy War is a highly entertaining game. Choose a strategy with the best equipment to fight!

If you are the FAN of classic games like galaxy attack, shoot flies and shoot the plane then this is a game you can not ignore. You are the chosen person to become a cosmonaut and protect the galaxy.

What makes Galaxy Wars so exciting?
== Amazing gameplay with action packed action elements
== Powerful Spacecraft with unique special skills
== unique enemies and bosses Lots of
== Optimized for casual to hardcore players
== Sparkling detailed graphic effects
== Game shoots the fleet of addictive and challenging.
== One of the fun and stressful action game genres.
== beautiful photos.Live sound.
== A unique, diverse fighter aircraft of your choice.
== With different enemies and exciting warriors.

Download and challenge your friends right now!
